snippet: “Child’s Pose,” by Calin Peter Netzer, is a family drama set in the new Romania.
abstract: Manohla Dargis reviews film Child's Pose, directed by Calin Peter Netzer.
lead_paragraph: “Child’s Pose,” by Calin Peter Netzer, is a family drama set in the new Romania.

headline.print_headline: A Frustrated Woman on the Verge of More of the Same
